name: Aurora Noise-Cancelling Headphones
review_1_text: Incredible sound and the noise cancelling is the best I've tried.
review_2_text: Great battery life, but the app is a bit buggy.

name: HomeHub Smart Controller
review_1_text: Works well with my lights and thermostat. Setup took 10 minutes.

name: RoboClean S7 Vacuum
review_1_text: Picked up a shocking amount of dust and mapped the house accurately.
review_2_text: Dock is convenient, though a little loud when emptying.
review_3_text: Sometimes misses corners, but still a big time saver.
notes: Includes 2 extra filters in the box.

name: PulseTrack Fit Smartwatch
review_1_text: Comfortable and accurate enough for daily runs.
review_2_text: Battery lasts as advertised. Screen could be brighter outdoors.

name: KeyForge Mechanical Keyboard
review_1_text: Great feel for the price, and the keys sound satisfying.
review_2_text: RGB is fun, but the software feels dated.
